summary: The Gateway Partnership Act authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the Gateway Arch Park Foundation to host private events within Gateway Arch National Park buildings.  The agreement details terms and conditions to protect park resources, including limitations on events, insurance requirements, and cost recovery for maintenance and administrative expenses. The bill ensures events are consistent with park purposes and do not hinder public access. Furthermore, It does not prevent NPS from hosting events or issuing permits.
